Message:
As I was about to give
my prince the finished doll,
I felt a small pain in my chest.

A dull pain, like being
pricked by thorns.

You’re just a doll...
but you’ll get to always
be by my prince’s side,
and he’ll cherish you.

That’s not fair...
I can’t even get him to
turn and look my way!

...! I-I can’t think like that.
I worked so hard to make you...

I’m sorry, my prince...
I guess I am
a wicked witch after all.

I really just wanted
to be by your side,
like your knight.

Even if there’s no way for
me to make you smile,
I’m sure this doll can.

From the time you say,
“Good morning,”
till it’s time to say,
“Good night,” hug it tight,
and always keep it by your side...

Hehe... Hehehe...
It’s about time to go.

I’m going to send you
a gift that’s brimming
with my everlasting love.
